ygData.subject: Re: Bards of different races, was:RE: A rant - but bard related - for the most part
ygData.msgSnippet: ... IRL my dad s family is Irish, my mom s was Scots.  At my Great-Uncles funeral, you could hear the piper s mournful wailing from 5 blocks away. I WANT MY
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Donny Dane" <ddane@...>
>
>Heh,
>
>I wanna be a big, kilt-wearing, bagpipe playing bard. Gimme some bagpipes!
>Heh, that should do great for a AOE Damage Song. Play the MacNasty's
>Bagpipe Revenge: A <insert MOB name here> bleeds at the ears!
>A massively dangerous, massively damaging song!
>
>I want bagpipes and a kilt! Oh, yeah, and some Haggis!
>
>MacGrough
>14th Song Bard
>Solusek Ro Wanderers
>


IRL my dad's family is Irish, my mom's was Scots. At my Great-Uncles
funeral, you could hear the piper's mournful wailing from 5 blocks away.

I WANT MY BARBARIAN BARD!!!!
(so long as there are a couple of red-haired
faces available)

Tindayen
